      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CategoricalAdjustable
      A class for an array of categorical character states for one character, at each of the taxa or nodes

      A subclass of CharacterHistory forRNA data.
      Methods in mesquite.categ.lib that return AdjustableDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdjustableDistribution CategoricalAdjustable.adjustSize(Taxa taxa)
      This readjust procedure can be called to readjust the size of storage of states of a character for nodes.
      AdjustableDistribution CategoricalDistribution.getAdjustableClone()
      returns a CharacterDistribution that is adjustable and has the same states

    • Uses of AdjustableDistribution in mesquite.lib.characters

      Subinterfaces of AdjustableDistribution in mesquite.lib.characters 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CharacterHistory
      Stores the states at all the nodes of a tree.
      interface  SlicedCharacterHistory
      A CharacterHistory that can indicate changes within branches, e.g.for stochastic character mapping
      Methods in mesquite.lib.characters that return AdjustableDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdjustableDistribution AdjustableDistribution.adjustSize(Taxa taxa)
      Adjusts the size of this to store states for each of the terminal taxa.
      AdjustableDistribution CharacterDistribution.getAdjustableClone()
      returns a CharacterDistribution that is adjustable and has the same states
      abstract AdjustableDistribution CharacterState.makeAdjustableDistribution(Taxa taxa, int numNodes)
      returns a AdjustableDistribution that is equivalent to this character type (i.e., in which sort of matrix would this character state reside?
